device.description: You will need the 32 character API Token, see https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/xiaomi_miio#retrieving-the-access-token for instructions. Please note, that this API Token is different from the key used by the Xiaomi Aqara integration.
device.title: uvFive MIoT device

error.unknown_device: 不支持的设备型号，无法通过此组件配置.
